risk_analysis.action_plan: CRITICAL ALERT: Detected difficulty breathing (x2). Immediate medical attention required. FAERS data indicates 122703 related reports. Advise patient to go to ER immediately.

transcript: Brings you in here today? Yeah. I have this, pain in my chest. Okay. And, where is the pain exactly? It's just right over on the on the left side. Okay. And, when did this paint start? It started just thirty minutes ago. Okay. And did it just come on randomly, or were you doing something strenuous? I was just shoveling the driveway, and it came on. Okay.
